comments: Plumlee (CHA) is drawn into the air on the pump fake toward Lyles (SAC) and is not in a legal guarding position when body contact occurs during Lyles' upward shooting motion.
Plumlee (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Murray's (SAC) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Murray (SAC) brings his forearm toward Plumlee's (CHA) right side and marginal contact occurs as Plumlee cuts along the baseline.
Mitchell (SAC) and Smith Jr. (CHA) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
Mitchell (SAC) brushes Plumlee's (CHA) slightly extended right arm and marginal contact occurs as Plumlee gathers at the end of the drive.
Murray (SAC) collapses his left forearm to his front and absorbs the marginal contact that occurs with Plumlee (CHA) at the end of the drive.
Hayward (CHA) brings his right hand toward Huerter's (SAC) side and marginal contact occurs as Huerter elevates to defend the pass.
Plumlee (CHA) firms up over his right foot and absorbs the side-to-side contact from Mitchell (SAC) during the screen.
Lyles (SAC) is retreating alongside Washington's (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs as Washington cuts back towards the basket.  Lyles then cleanly blocks Washington's driving shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) and Murray (SAC) each elevate to pursue the rebound and marginal body contact occurs as they come together.
Smith Jr. (CHA) cleanly deflects the ball away from Mitchell (SAC) as he attempts to pass.
Plumlee (CHA) and Lyles (SAC) each make clean contact with the ball, and any ensuing contact is incidental.
Mitchell (SAC) cleanly deflects the ball away from Plumlee (CHA) in transition.
Lyles (SAC) establishes himself in a screening position in Washington's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Mitchell (SAC) does not bring part of his hand under the ball when he brings his dribble to a pause.
Barnes (SAC) places his hands momentarily on Washington's (CHA) side before he removes his hands.
Prior to the five second violation being whistled, Dellavedova (SAC) places his hand momentarily on McDaniels' (CHA) hip during the inbound.
Plumlee (CHA) does not inbound the ball within five seconds.

McDaniels (CHA) briefly has his arm around Murray's (SAC) midsection before correcting during the inbound. McDaniels attempts to deflect the pass away and marginal contact occurs with Murray's back as he mishandles the ball.
McDaniels' (CHA) right hand comes down as he pursues the loose ball and marginal contact occurs with Murray's (SAC) right shoulder as he re-gains control.
Murray (SAC) saves the ball back into play before landing out of bounds.
Smith Jr. (CHA) commits a take foul on Barnes (SAC).
Lyles (SAC) grasps and then quickly releases Washington's (CHA) arm off-ball.
Washington (CHA) establishes a screening position outside of Barnes' (SAC) field of view, and he does not give him a step to avoid the contact.
Lyles (SAC) commits a take foul on Hayward (CHA).
Mitchell (SAC) is already in McDaniels' (CHA) path and absorbs the marginal body contact that occurs as they come together during the inbound.
Barnes (SAC) and Smith Jr. (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Mitchell (SAC) legally contests McDaniels' (CHA) jump shot attempt.
